document_data.name: The Twelve Short Adventurers
document_data.mainbody: '''The Twelve Short Adventurers''' was a popular circus troupe that traveled across the [[Sea of Swords]] and throughout the [[Nelanther Isles]], hosting lavish and imaginative performances to thunderous applause, sometime before [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Twelve Short Adventurers was a group of twelve [[halfling]]s that consisted of acrobats, escape artists, and jugglers.
document_data.Possessions: Most notable items that were either created for the Twelve Short Adventurers or inspired by them were appropriately named magical ''[[Juggling Axes of the Twelve Short Adventurers]]''.
